entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
